survey.heading: Survey editor
survey.title: Your survery title
survey.templatePlaceholderTextField: e. g. Suggestion A, B, C & 42
survey.templatePlaceholderTextArea: e. g. Suggestion D or E & 5
survey.labelPlaceholderTextArea: Suggestions & Maximal rows (~50 Character per row, 1 <-> 15), default: 3 rows
survey.missingTitle: You have to enter a survey title!
survey.missingIFQQuestion: You have to enter a question for a regular input field!
survey.missingTAQQuestion: You have to enter a question for a large text area!
survey.missingMCQQuestion: You have to enter a question for a single/multiple choice element!
survey.missingMCQAnswers: You have to create at least two answers per single/multiple choice question!
survey.emptyMCQAnswers: You have to create at least two non-empty answers per single/multiple choice question!
survey.duplicateMCQAnswers: You have to create different answers for single/multiple choice question!
